mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SHARE_HOUSE (BOARD_NO, HOUSE_ADDRESS, HOUSE_LATITUDE, HOUSE_LONGITUDE, INFORMATION, THUMBNAIL) VALUES (#{boardNo}, #{houseAddress}, #{houseLatitude}, #{houseLongitude}, #{information}, #{thumbnail})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ROOM WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM ROOM_IMAGE WHERE ROOM_NO = #{roomNo} AND STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY FILE_LEVEL

SELECT BOARD.BOARD_NO, USER_NO, TITLE, HOUSE_LATITUDE, HOUSE_LONGITUDE, THUMBNAIL, HOUSE_ADDRESS, (SELECT MIN(RENT) FROM ROOM WHERE BOARD_NO = BOARD.BOARD_NO ) MIN_AMOUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WISH_LIST WHERE BOARD_NO = BOARD.BOARD_NO AND USER_NO = #{userNo}) WISH FROM BOARD LEFT JOIN SHARE_HOUSE ON SHARE_HOUSE.BOARD_NO = BOARD.BOARD_NO WHERE CATEGORY_U_NO = '2' AND STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO TOUR (ROOM_NO, USER_NO, MOVE_IN, ENQUIRY, STATUS) VALUES (#{roomNo}, #{userNo}, #{moveIn}, #{enquiry}, default)
mapper.update: UPDATE SHARE_HOUSE SET HOUSE_ADDRESS = #{houseAddress}, HOUSE_LATITUDE = #{houseLatitude}, HOUSE_LONGITUDE = #{houseLongitude}, THUMBNAIL = #{thumbnail}, INFORMATION = #{information} WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}

UPDATE ROOM SET RECRUITS_NUM = #{recruitsNum}, DIVISION = #{division}, GENDER = #{gender}, TYPE = #{type}, AREA = #{area}, DEPOSIT = #{deposit}, RENT = #{rent}, COST = #{cost}, CONTRAT = #{contrat} WHERE ROOM_NO = #{roomNo}
mapper.select: SELECT CHANGE_NAME FROM ROOM_IMAGE WHERE ROOM_NO = ( SELECT MIN(ROOM_NO) FROM ROOM WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND STATUS = 'Y') AND STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY FILE_LEVEL LIMIT 1
